dc.title: Federal OSDBU Directors Interagency Council _________________________________________________________________
dc.description: The Federal OSDBU Directors Interagency Council exchanges information on methods, initiatives, and processes that will permit our respective agencies to more effectively utilize small businesses in our prime contracts and subcontracts to the maximum extent practicable.
